Name: Classical Showdown
Description: Select <color=#0F70BC>1-3 character(s)</color> to battle against <color=#0F70BC>3 groups of enemies</color>. Each game consists of <color=#0F70BC>3 battles</color>, and in each battle, <color=#0F70BC>you will deploy all characters to fight against 1 group of enemies</color>. The winner of each battle will get to keep their remaining HP to the next battle. Defeat all enemies to win a battle.

Name: Duo Effort
Description: Select <color=#0F70BC>1-2 character(s)</color> to battle against <color=#0F70BC>2 groups of enemies</color>. Each game only consists of <color=#0F70BC>1 battle</color>. <color=#0F70BC>You will deploy all characters with AI controlling the character you are not controlling to fight against all enemies</color>. Defeat all enemies to win a battle.

Name: Arena
Description: Select <color=#0F70BC>1-3 character(s)</color> to battle against <color=#0F70BC>3 groups of enemies</color>. Each game consists of <color=#0F70BC>3-5 battles</color>, and in each battle, <color=#0F70BC>you will deploy 1 character to fight against 1 group of enemies</color>. The winner of each battle will get to keep their remaining HP to the next battle. Defeat all enemies to win a battle.

Name: Deathmatch
Description: Select <color=#0F70BC>1-3 character(s)</color> to battle against <color=#0F70BC>3 groups of enemies</color>. Each game only consists of <color=#0F70BC>1 battle</color>, and in each battle, <color=#0F70BC>you will deploy all characters to fight against all enemies</color>. Defeat all enemies to win a battle.

Name: Endless Battle
Description: Select <color=#0F70BC>1 character</color> to perform multiple battles. If the character wins a battle, the character will advance to the next battle with the remaining HP and have their <color=#0F70BC>win streak and challenge time</color> recorded. You can change the character by abandoning the ongoing challenge, but this will <color=#0F70BC>end the win streak and you will start over from the very first battle</color>.

Name: Emergency Transfer
Description: Select <color=#0F70BC>1 character</color> to perform multiple battles. If the character wins a battle, the character will advance to the next battle with the remaining HP. Allies have <color=#0F70BC>2 replacement members</color>. If a character dies, a replacement will be <color=#0F70BC>randomly dispatched</color>.
